ch.iserver.ace.algorithm
Interface InclusionTransformation

All Known Implementing Classes:
GOTOInclusionTransformation
public interface InclusionTransformation

Interface for inclusion transformation functions.

Method Summary
 Operation transform(Operation op1, Operation op2, Object param)
          Include operation op2 into the context of operation op1.
 int transformIndex(int index, Operation op, Object param)
          Transforms an index against the given operation.
 

Method Detail

transform

Operation transform(Operation op1,
                    Operation op2,
                    Object param)
Include operation op2 into the context of operation op1. The transformed operation op1' is returned.

Parameters:
op1 - the operation into which another is to be contextually included.
op2 - the operation to be included.
param - an additional parameter depending on the implementation.
Returns:
the transformed operation op1'

transformIndex

int transformIndex(int index,
                   Operation op,
                   Object param)
Transforms an index against the given operation.

Parameters:
index - the index to be transformed
op - the Operation to be transformed
param - an additional implementation dependent parameter
Returns:
the transformed index
